name: Oasis Of Scents - Artisanal Perfume Making
description:
An ode to the masterful craft of perfume making and the country's best noses,
this experience will have you develop a discerning sense of smell, understand
the nuances of perfumery as a science and art, as well as how fragrances
passively contribute to our overall experiences to create a lasting memory.

_**The experience includes navigating through various fragrance notes to
formulate your own customised bottle of perfume, under the guidance of an
expert.**_

name: Flavours of Thailand - A Thai Cookalong Experience
description:
At the heart of Thai cooking lies balance not just of flavours, but of
philosophy. Every dish is guided by the principle of harmony, where sweet,
sour, spicy, salty and bitter notes come together without overpowering one
another. It’s this balance that gives Thai cuisine its unmistakable depth and
global appeal.****

**In this experience, you’ll step into this world of layered flavours and
textures through a guided cookalong led by a culinary expert. Learn how to
build dishes that feel balanced as you make classics like Pad Thai, Pad Kra
Pao (Basil Chicken), and Mango Sticky Rice and sit down to enjoy a meal that
reminds you why Thai cuisine has captured hearts (and appetites) across the
world.**

location.name: Bruar School of Baking & Culinary Arts

name: The Espresso Lab - Crafting Barista-Style Beverages - Christmas Edit
description:
As India’s love for coffee grows, so does the curiosity about the craft. At
the heart of almost every coffee beverage we love sits the espresso - a small,
intense and richly layered shot of finely ground coffee that will fascinate
every kind of coffee drinker.  

It may look like a small, simple shot of coffee. But espresso is one of the
most complex brews in the world - a result of timing, pressure, and grind
coming together in just a few quick seconds.

In this hands-on experience powered by Häfele, step into the shoes of a
barista and explore the science behind espresso. Pull your own shots using
**Häfele’s U-Kaffee Plus espresso machines** , taste the difference between
under, over and perfectly extracted brews, and craft three **Christmas themed
beverages - ⁠Dark Chocolate Orange Mocha, ⁠Ginger Bread Latte and Plum Cake
Latte.**

name: Art of the Alley - Graffiti Through the Ages
description:
A form of unbounded artistic expression or an act of rebellion - Graffiti been
raising the same questions for the thousands of years that it has been around.

Uncover the rebellious roots of graffiti and its journey to mainstream
recognition. This hands-on graffiti making experience includes learning and
practising the art on a life-size canvas, guided by stories of iconic pieces
and artists, who revolutionised the art form.

location.name: Runway 27
location.address: Yemalur, Off Old Airport Road, Bangalore

name: Echoes of Calm - An Immersive Sound Bath Experience
description:
The use of sound for healing dates back thousands of years to various ancient
cultures. Indigenous peoples have long used drums, chanting, and other
instruments for ceremonial and therapeutic purposes. These practices were
often tied to spiritual rituals and were believed to have healing properties.

This immersive sound bath experience is built on the enduring belief in the
power of sound, and sets you on the path to healing, relaxation, and spiritual
growth.

name: The Soul's Palette - An Introduction to Textured Art - Christmas Edit
description:
Tracing its roots to prehistoric cave paintings, textured art began when early
humans used natural pigments, clay and ash to create tactile, layered visuals
on rock walls. Over centuries, this instinct to add depth evolved as seen in
everything from Renaissance frescoes to Van Gogh’s impasto strokes.

  

In the 20th century, textured art came into its own, as artists began
experimenting with fabric, sand, paper and found objects to push beyond the
flat canvas. Today, it spans styles from abstract and expressionism to realism
and surrealism each piece layered with depth, feeling and character.

  

Join our experience and explore the sensory richness of texture as you sculpt,
layer and paint a **Christmas themed textured art piece** that’s entirely your
own. Let your creativity flow freely onto a canvas that’s tactile, expressive
and personal.

name: Spin City - The Artistry of Pole
description:
While the origin story of pole art is multifaceted, spanning across multiple
cultures and time periods, today pole dance is regarded as an art form
celebrated for its fusion of athleticism, grace, and creativity.

_**This experience is an immersion into the art of pole movement, looking
beyond its association with strip clubs to embracing it as a wonderful way to
move and stay fit.**_

name: Hula Harmony - Explore Movement Through Hooping
description:
A toy that was once designed for recreation, hula hooping gradually took the
world by a storm, starting with the United States in the late 1950s. Today
hula hooping is not just a playful activity, but also a form of exercise and
artistic expression. A cultural phenomenon, influencing music, fashion, and
dance.

**_This experience will involve a guided introduction to hula hooping, tricks
and transitions and flow choreography through some fun activities!_**

name: The Craft of Mixology - Making & Mastering A Fine Cocktail
description:
Discover the world of cocktails and spirits and learn how to balance your own
cocktail concoction under the guidance of expert mixologists.

The experience will include a quick introduction to different spirits,
cocktail making techniques, bar equipment, interesting garnishing tips along
with various stories and myths around cocktails and spirits.

name: Art In Fragments - A Mosaic Art Experience - Christmas Edit
description:
What would you do with broken tiles, leftover glass or scraps of pottery?

5,000 years ago, people pieced them together to decorate walls and ceilings,
breathe new life into spaces and tell stories that lasted centuries and they
still hold value today. That’s the beauty of mosaics: tiny pieces (tesserae)
come together to create patterns and pictures that seem almost magical from a
distance.

****  

Step into this vibrant world with our Mosaic Art experience. Explore this
centuries-old craft and with step-by-step guidance from an expert, **create
your own Christmas-themed mosaic masterpiece** while gaining a deeper
appreciation for this timeless art form.

name: The Crafted Spread - A Hands-On Cheese Grazing Table Experience - Christmas Edit
description:
For as long as humans have gathered, food has been the centerpiece of
community. It has always reflected culture, care and the spirit of sharing.

Grazing tables carry that spirit into today. More than a display of food,
they’re an expression of creativity and detail that elevates the simplest food
into something intentional and crafted.

**This experience explores the craft of building thoughtful Christmas-themed
cheese grazing tables. Discover how presentation shapes perception, arranging
becomes an act of hosting and how small details make a table truly
memorable.**

name: The Way of Flowers - Flower Arrangement Experience - Christmas Edit
description:
Arranging flowers is one of the simplest ways to bring beauty into a space,
yet the craft becomes truly special when you slow down and create with
intention.

In this experience, you’ll explore how balance, colour, texture, height and
negative space come together to form a thoughtful arrangement. Each stem, leaf
and bloom is placed with purpose, and the final composition naturally reflects
the person creating it, their mood, their style, their sense of the season.

**Step into a calm, meditative setting and be guided by an expert in the
craft. With the Christmas spirit in the air, you’ll work with festive reds and
greens, dried elements and seasonal accents to shape an arrangement from your
own perspective. Finish the session by styling an elegant tablescape designed
for holiday hosting.**
